name: Hotel Tornabuoni Beacci

reviews.title: Elegant and lovely!
reviews.text: I had a wonderful stay at the hotel and everyone took care to make it very special. The location, quality of service, décor and facilities were all excellent and I particularly loved the floral terrace. To sit amongst all those beautiful flowers and watch the lunar eclipse was a unique and memorable moment. In fact, to sit there was the perfect end to every perfect day. The room was elegantly furnished and the linen immaculate. Breakfast was varied, fresh and the coffee hot - thank you. Nothing was too much trouble at the front desk and they smiled while they went that extra mile for you.

reviews.title: Beacci Tornabouni is a treasure of Florence

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I took a group of 32 people to stay at the wonderful Hotel Beacci Tornabuoni in early October. I wanted a hotel that was historic, well located and warm and welcoming. I was not disappointed. The hotel is beautiful and the staff, especially Angelo, were excellent in every regard. From the owner, Mr. Beacci, to the woman who cleaned my room-each person was warm and friendly and made you feel like you were a guest in their home. Each and every person in my group loved this hotel. Each room is different and not one was a disappointment. The common areas are beautiful, especially the roof top garden patio. Views from the rooms are a memory you will cherish. This is definately an oasis of peace within walking distance of all of the highlights of Florence. The food was outstanding. Breakfast pleantiful and sustaining. Dinner served on the beautiful patio is definately a special event. If you are looking for a hotel that gives you a feeling of Florence, this is a great choice. I hope to return in the near future.

reviews.text: We have returned again and again to the Beacci, it is our favorite hotel in Italy. The hotel is beautifully decorated and they have many public spaces including sitting rooms, a breakfast/dining room, a new improved larger bar and a lovely outdoor terrace with a view of the rooftops of Florence. They serve breakfast and dinner on the terrace in warmer weather. We had a lovely dinner there on our last visit.

reviews.text: Just returned from three nights here (10/18 - 10/21) and must warn that there is construction adjacent to the hotel (a Burberry store?) and some rooms are quite noisy. Our spacious (two sinks!) accommodations faced an interior courtyard, that amplified the sound (does anyone like hearing metal being cut?). The hotel did show us other rooms, that were so much smaller, we stayed where we were. This was our last stop and we just had no energy to change hotels.

description: The Bechi Family is happy to welcome you to the site of the Hotel Tornabuoni Beacci to discover this charming hotel which is located in two Renaissance palaces, the Palazzo Minerbetti and the Palazzo Strozzi del Poeta, on one of Florence’s most elegant shopping streets and close to the monuments which have made this city famous the world over. The Hotel Tornabuoni Beacci with its heirloom furnishings, refined elegance and modern comforts is a charming and enchanting location on Florence’s most elegant shopping street, the Via de’ Tornabuoni. The hotel consists of two Renaissance palaces, the Palazzo Minerbetti and the Palazzo Strozzi del Poeta, two unique buildings in the heart of Florence’s artistic and historical centre, close to the Ponte Vecchio bridge, the Uffizi Art Gallery and the Basilica di Santa Maria del Fiore with Brunelleschi’s famous dome and Giotto’s belfry.
